jokes-home.content:

--50 Nerds of grey

jokes-home-next.content:
'Come over,' she begged. 'I need you right now!' 'Just turn it off and on again,' he sighed. He hated these late night rebooty calls.

--50 Nerds of Grey

jokes-home-prev.content:

--50 Nerds of Grey
